work.name: CESAR
work.summary:
2018-2023

Collaboration on defining a platform foundation for infrastructure tooling using Ansible playbooks and roles to manage hundreds of Linux virtual machines running on an OpenStack private cloud. Support for teams developing applications using PHP/Symfony-based web apps running with MySQL and PostgreSQL databases. Administration of a Jenkins instance used by 10 to 20 project teams, offering support on Jenkinsfile scripts for their project jobs.

Development of software solutions using Groovy/Grails stack, along with platform automation using tools such as Ansible for environment provisioning and Jenkins for Continuous Integration builds.

2015-2018

Contribution to the development of a web app using PHP/httpd as a server-side platform, Composer-based dependency management and Backbone/Marionette as the front-end framework. Project developed using Continuous Integration tools such as TeamCity CI for automated builds, along with Docker and Docker Compose in order to deploy the whole stack.

2014-2015

Participation in a game dev project for Smart TVs with the use of technologies like Phaser.js and Unity SDK.

Web app development using Java Platform, Spring Framework and PostgreSQL for the back-end stack, and as for the front-end side, adoption of popular web libraries such as Handlebars.js and Bootstrap.
